CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( FOB_Additional_Contract__r.Status__c, 'Forward Contract Sell' ), ISPICKVAL( FOB_Additional_Contract__r.Status__c, 'PO Cancellation' ), ISPICKVAL( FOB_Additional_Contract__r.Status__c, 'Completed (PO Cancel)')), Cover_Amount_Spot_Rate__c - Cover_Amount_Contract_Rate__c, null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Spot Rate Amt in SGD - Contract Rate Amt in SGD
CustomField.label: Gain/Loss
